title: Product
description: This class is used to capture minimum set of properties that define a product.

xdm:createdAt.title: Created At Date
xdm:createdAt.description: The date when this product was created. The time using RFC3339 with a stated time zone offset such as "2001-07-04T12:08:56-07:00". An example formatting pattern is "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ssXXX".

xdm:cogs.title: Cost of Goods Sold
xdm:cogs.description: Cost of Goods Sold of the product

xdm:currencyCode.title: Currency Code
xdm:currencyCode.description: The ISO 4217 alphabetic currency code used for cost and pricing, including `listPrice` and `COGS`.

xdm:lastModifiedDate.title: Last Modified Date
xdm:lastModifiedDate.description: The date when this product was last modified for any updates. The time using RFC3339 with a stated time zone offset such as "2001-07-04T12:08:56-07:00". An example formatting pattern is "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ssXXX".

xdm:mainImageUrl.title: Main Image URL
xdm:mainImageUrl.description: Main Image URL for the product

xdm:manufactureDate.title: Manufacture date
xdm:manufactureDate.description: The date when this product was created. The time using RFC3339 with a stated time zone offset such as "2001-07-04T12:08:56-07:00". An example formatting pattern is "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ssXXX".

xdm:newFromDate.title: New From Date
xdm:newFromDate.description: New From Date of the product. The time using RFC3339 with a stated time zone offset such as "2001-07-04T12:08:56-07:00". An example formatting pattern is "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ssXXX".

xdm:newToDate.title: New To Date
xdm:newToDate.description: New To Date of the product. The time using RFC3339 with a stated time zone offset such as "2001-07-04T12:08:56-07:00". An example formatting pattern is "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ssXXX".

xdm:productListPrice.title: Product List price
xdm:productListPrice.description: Default price of the product before sales and discounting.

xdm:productAddMethod.title: Product Add Method
xdm:productAddMethod.description: Product Add Method of the product. Typically, only captured in an experience event

xdm:productFindingMethod.title: Product Finding Method
xdm:productFindingMethod.description: Product Finding Method of the product. Typically, only captured in an experience event

xdm:productListPosition.title: Product List Position
xdm:productListPosition.description: Product List Position of the product when multiple products are displayed. Typically, only captured in an experience event

xdm:quantity.title: Quantity
xdm:quantity.description: Quantity of the product. Typically, only captured in an experience event

xdm:rating.title: Rating
xdm:rating.description: Customer review rating of the product.

xdm:specialFromDate.title: Special From Date
xdm:specialFromDate.description: Special From Date of the product. The time using RFC3339 with a stated time zone offset such as "2001-07-04T12:08:56-07:00". An example formatting pattern is "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ssXXX".

xdm:specialToDate.title: Special To Date
xdm:specialToDate.description: Special To Date of the product. The time using RFC3339 with a stated time zone offset such as "2001-07-04T12:08:56-07:00". An example formatting pattern is "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ssXXX".

xdm:subcategory.title: Subcategory
xdm:subcategory.description: Subcategory of the product. Typically used in conjunction with category

xdm:skuVariant.title: SKU Variant
xdm:skuVariant.description: SKU which may be used a specific size, color or finish of a product
